slide-1.title: How to Play
content: You predict the result of 3 dice that are dropped into a box. You can bet on various outcomes such as Single Dice, Dice Combination, Double Dice, Triple Dice, the Sum of 3 Dice, and even Big/Small/Odd/Even.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: A single dice result is a specific number from 1 to 6, while a dice combination is a combination of numbers from 2 dice that you are betting on.

slide-3.title: How to Play
content: The sum of the 3 dice is the total of the numbers on the 3 dice. A 'small' bet wins if the total of the 3 dice is 4 to 10, and a 'big' bet wins if the total is 11 to 17. For odd/even, the total of the 3 dice is either odd or even.

slide-4.title: How to Play
content: A double or triple dice result refers to a specific pair or triple of numbers, and 'all triple' means all three dice show the same number.
